original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares edge up in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka‘s shares edged up in mid day trade on Wednesday, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index was up 0.40 percent or 45.91 points to 11,432.63, the mot liquid index S&P SL20 was up 0.21 percent or 6.92 points to 3,316.52
Gainers during 1230 hours were Commercial Bank, DFCC Bank & NDB Bank. (Colombo/Aug02/2023)
